title: Feedback-Based Mathematical Problem-Solving Strategies for Diagnostic Correction Improvement

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic mathematical concepts and managerial experience in workplace settings
context.additional_context: Basic math competency enhancement program for managers/leaders, focusing on improving diagnostic skills for complex problems

learning_goals: Learners can diagnose error probabilities in complex mathematical problems with 85% or higher accuracy
Learners can accurately assess their confidence levels on a 5-point scale when solving problems using feedback systems
Learners can modify strategies to improve problem-solving accuracy by 20% or more after incorporating feedback
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
